lead_paragraph: Filled with warm (and wacky) family drama, this fabulous comedy about two sisters (newcomers Shannon Lea Smith and Laurel Vail), their gay best friend ("So You Think You Can Dance" winner Benji Schwimmer), and their overzealous stage mother (legenda
